Summary: Very very bright star -- like a meteor but moving left to right very slowly
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Kankakee
There were no other sightings in Kankakee on or around May 3rd 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting working on my computer when I noticed a very bright flash of light moving left to right across my site out my window. It did not light up the sky, but rather it looked like the brightest star ever moving across from left to right. About 30 minutes later I heard helicopters or airplanes in the air around here which is pretty unusual.
